results.title: France panorama. [No. 73?/01]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items: 1. Super subway. 2. Fashion designers. 3. Paco Ibanez in a recording studio and performing at a nightclub. 4. Arts and letters - dignitary from Senegal admitted to the Academy; artworks, paintings and sculpture find a new home, The Pavilion. 5. Christmas in Paris - President Pompidou entertains 600 children in the Palace at Christmas; tour of Paris luxury shops.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 73/17]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: The new Cabinet - appointment of the first cabinet of the new French Legislative Assembly. Audiovisual media and communications - the International Audiovisual Media Show. Transafrican motor run - elimination tryouts for young candidates. 2. Felix Blaska in Grenoble - Blaska’s Ballet troupe has a port of call in Grenoble’s House of Culture.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 73/15]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Vietnamese Confeds - peace agreements to Vietnam. 2. Pasteur Institute - celebrates 150 years since the medical researcher, Pasteur’s birth. 3. The French Academy welcomes an American - author Julien Green, born in Paris at the turn of the 20th century and in 1919 immigrated to his mother’s homeland, the USA. 4. The arts: Visionaries of 1900 Intimists - explores the painting and sculptures of various Intimist artists. Intimism was a minority, little known art movement from around 1900. Five centures of imagery - an exhibition at the Museum of Popular Arts and Traditions.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 73/14]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The world of agriculture - the agriculture and agricultural machinery salon. 150 years of photography - from Nicephore Niepce to the photos of the moon. 2. Carzou - portrait of a contemporary painter.
